document.full_text: the venomous egyptian cobra that crawled its way to worldwide fame by escaping its enclosure at new york's bronx zoo for a week has been given a name -- mia as in "missing in action."
document.title: escaped bronx zoo cobra named mia for "missing in action"
lines_and_colors: the venomous egyptian cobra that crawled its way to worldwide fame by escaping its enclosure at new york's bronx zoo for a week has been given a name -- mia as in "missing in action."
